# Formation tidyverse

Le code source de la formation tidyverse est accessible sur le [dépot GitHub](https://github.com/umr-marbec/tidyverse-training){.external target=“_blank”}. La présentation associée est disponible à [l'adresse suivante](https://umr-marbec.github.io/tidyverse-training/){.external target=“_blank”}.

La dernière session a eu lieu le 3 et 4 mars 2025.

Des précisions seront communiquées ultérieurement concernant les prochaines sessions.

![](../../ressources/formations/tidyverse/image_intro.png){fig-align="center" width="60%"}
:::

::: {.content-visible when-profile="english"}
# Tidyverse training

The source code for the tidyverse training course is available on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/umr-marbec/tidyverse-training){.external target=“_blank”}. The associated presentation is available at [the following address](https://umr-marbec.github.io/tidyverse-training/){.external target=“_blank”}.

The last session took place on March 3 and 4, 2025.

Details of future sessions will be announced at a later date.

![](../../ressources/formations/tidyverse/image_intro.png){fig-align="center" width="60%"}
:::
